law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 112, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 29, sec. 2, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 45, sec. 3, effective June 24, 2003; and ch. 70, sec. 3, effective June 24, 2003.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/24/2003). 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 45, sec. 3, and 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 70, sec. 3, are substantially identical and have been codified together.
